author: bigomer
title: Awesome property- will return soon
text: I get to Paris every 6 months and usually stay at the Westin. I thought i would give the newly renovated hilton Opera a try even though it was set back a bit further from the Louvre. the Hotel and rooms were beautiful- classy . I liked it better than the Westin- it just felt newer- hipper and up to date. Traffic can be very congested in that area so it did take a bit of extra time getting in and out of the hotel area. I was worried about room noise but had a room facing the front of the hotel on a high floor facing the street and it was fine- no noise issues.
